title: Antifungal effect and mechanism of 405 nm light-emitting diodes combined with riboflavin on Penicillium digitatum and Penicillium italicum.
abstract: This study was designed to evaluate the antifungal effect of a 405 nm light-emitting diode (LED) combined with an exogenous photosensitizer against Penicillium digitatum and Penicillium italicum and elucidate the antifungal mechanism.
